summary: Jerry, Reno and Paco are in prison, where they meet a young Mexican man who claims he has been convicted for a crime he hasn't committed. Mysteriously, the three men are released of prison and proceed to prove the Mexican man's innocence.

director: Director: Sergio Garrone (as Willy S. Regan)
title: Tre croci per non morire
